name: javascript
description: A slightly opinionated approach to JavaScript.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config:base && npm run install:config:react
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:react: cd packages/eslint-config-react && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run --silent test:config:base && npm run --silent test:config:react
scripts.travis: npm run --silent travis:config:base && npm run --silent travis:config:react

author: Dirk Haage <dirk@cospired.com>
